public method context::IntegerFunctions2::C (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in C: 7
sub C {
  shift; my ($n,$r) = @_; my $C = 1;
  return (0) if($r>$n);
  $r = $n-$r if ($r > $n-$r); # find the smaller of the two
  for (1..$r) {$C = ($C*($n-$_+1))/$_}
  return $C
}
public method context::IntegerFunctions2::Init (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in Init: 11
sub Init {
  my $context = $main::context{IntegerFunctions} = Parser::Context->getCopy("Numeric");
  $context->{name} = "IntegerFunctions";

  $context->functions->add(
    C => {class => 'context::IntegerFunctions2'},
    P => {class => 'context::IntegerFunctions2'},
  );

  main::Context("IntegerFunctions");
}
public method context::IntegerFunctions2::P (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in P: 6
sub P {
  shift; my ($n,$r) = @_; my $P = 1;
  return (0) if($r>$n);
  for (1..$r) {$P *= ($n-$_+1)}
  return $P
}
